quote: Even a hare will bite when it is cornered.  – Chinese Proverb
fact: There are only four words in the English language which end in "dous": tremendous, horrendous, stupendous, and  hazardous.
joke: Why did the worker get fired from the orange juice factory? Lack of concentration.
